channel.title: Home on James Tripp

item.title: Container for blogdown?
item.description: I went on a bit of an adventure. My quest, to create a reproducible environment for making my website using the R Blogdown package. Blogdown The blogdown package is superb. I created this site by installing Hugo via blogdown::install_hugo() and then, in a folder for a github repo, running the below. blogdown::new_site(theme = 'yihui/hugo-xmin') The xmin theme (GitHub) is simple. Keeping it simple allows me to customise and, maybe, fix any future errors.
